adDetails: Need help with math? I am here to help. I will help your child better understand terminology, theorems, facts, formulas, and concepts, as well as apply tools and ideas that will make problems easier to understand and solve and aid in test preparation. Qualifications: I am a graduate of California Polytechnic University in San Luis Obispo with a Bachelor's of Science in Mathematics. I have participated in the Credential Program for Single Subject-Mathematics at Cal Poly. I have a current and valid Preliminary Single Subject Teaching Credential for the state of California. I have 5 years of tutoring experience (students from Cal Poly, San Luis Obispo HS, Laguna Middle School, Live Oak HS, Sobrato HS, Santa Teresa HS, and various students in San Jose). I have in-classroom experience from teaching both middle school and high school math classes. I have passed the CBEST. I am also able to tutor for the Math portions of SAT, SAT II, and/or ACT. Courses: Pre-Algebra, Algebra ($25); Geometry ($30); Algebra II ($35); Trigonometry, SAT, SAT II, ACT ($35); Pre-Calculus ($40); Bus. Calculus, Calculus (single- or multi-variable) ($45) Testimonies (from parents and students): -Mr. Smith is well-versed in his subject and a very effective teacher; he helped our 15-year old master Algebra far more effectively than her public school teacher. He is conscientious, thorough, and focuses on the the subject matter. He is prompt and does not waste time on chit-chat. -Kyle Smith was excellent in working with my son. My son was in a combo Calculus class and was suppose to take the Calculus AB test but with Kyle's help my son took the Calculus BC. He was very knowledgeable on the subject, patient in working with my son and could explain the critical concepts well. We plan to have Kyle tutor my son on SAT tests next. Charge between $25-45/hr, depending on class. If interested, please email. Thank you. Regions: Campbell, Cupertino, Morgan Hill, San Jose, Sunnyvale
